document.full_text: a relentless novak djokovic dethroned clay king rafa nadal on the spaniard's home soil and maintained his extraordinary season when he stunned the world number one 7-5 6-4 to win the madrid masters title sunday.
document.title: djokovic stuns clay king nadal in madrid final
lines_and_colors: a relentless novak djokovic dethroned clay king rafa nadal on the spaniard's home soil and maintained his extraordinary season when he stunned the world number one 7-5 6-4 to win the madrid masters title sunday.
